name: 5 Hour Stew
ingredients: 2 lbs beef stew meat 1 onion, diced
6 carrots, peeled and cut up 1/4 cup tapioca
4 medium potatoes, peeled and cut up 2 tsp salt
1 green onion, chopped 1 19oz can stewed tomatoes
steps: In a covered casserole dish mix together all ingredients. Bake at 250 for 5 hours. Do not uncover or stir while
baking. Vegetables will stay firm and more colorful. (last time I made this I substituted flour for tapioca -­‐
thickening agent-­‐ and I cooked it in a crockpot)
